Author: kpro1982
Content: Do you have the config.cpp in the correct place  in your folder structure? A config.cpp needs to be at the top of the every branch that you want included in the final pbo. Sometimes people accidentally put data in a folder branch not covered by a config.cpp, with the result that the data cannot be found after the mod is built. According to your post you would need a config.cpp in `YK_Radio` or one in `Cassettes`. Also it would help if you provided the error that you are getting because otherwise we are sort of in the dark.
